Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi

Class ServerRMIConnectionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.networking.ServerConnectionHandler
      • it.polimi.ingsw.networking.rmi.ServerRMIConnectionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMIAsyncHelper, Pingable, Loggable, java.io.Serializable
    public class ServerRMIConnectionHandler
extends ServerConnectionHandler
implements RMIAsyncHelper
    This class is responsible for handling a single client rmi connection, it runs into a single thread with multiple thread implementing message handling.
    Author:
    Elena Iannucci
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
